sect1.title: Geotools Authors
sect1.para: To find more information about Geotools please visit the Web site.

If you have some comments or suggestions regarding this manual or the geotools library; if you need help, want to report a bug, or simply want to meet the team, please contact us! See the web page for links to the mailing list, to the irc chatroom, or for other ways to reach us.
